###Explanation for run_analysis.R
The script has the following functionality (numbers refer to blocks of code in the script):

1. Reads info about the features and activity names
2. Reads the training data and test data
3. Merges the test and training data into one dataset
4. Creates a new dataset with the mean calculated per activity and subject
5. Stores the new dataset in a .txt file

Note: for the code to provide the expected output, the data should exist in your working directory!
